name: WP PrestaShop Categories
author: Joel Gaujard

sections.description:
Displays CATEGORIES of your PrestaShop ecommerce website on your blog.
Displays “home categories” (level depth = 1) on your blog.

You need to install the PrestaShop module for WordPress categories on your ecommerce website to use this plugin : http://prestashop.joelgaujard.info/product.php?id_product=17

Some functionalities :

  • configure the URL of your PrestaShop ecommerce website
  • creation of one widget to displays categories
  • specify if you want to display image category

Arbitrary section

You must read this tutorial : http://blog.joelgaujard.info/tutorial/tutorial-prestashop-wordpress
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder wp-prestashop-categories to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Buy and install prestashop module : wordpress categories
sections.faq:
What I have to put on my PrestaShop website ?

You have to download the module wordpress categories for PrestaShop created by the same author of this module.
